send-description: Select a due date for the request before submitting
confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this request?
public-comment-placeholder: This is a public comment. Every user with access to this request can see it
private-comment-placeholder: This a private comment. Only you can see it
attachments-description: In this section it is possible to upload files. Uploaded files will not be saved as a draft, so it is important to upload them immediately before submitting your request
